All Implemented Interfaces:
org.bukkit.configuration.Configuration, org.bukkit.configuration.ConfigurationSection
public class Configuration
extends org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration

Substitute for the old Bukkit configuration object. Replicates the old functionality in the new object

Author:
codename_B, desht, iffa (JavaDocs, my standrads are also rats)
